name: Aethra
title: Tribune
abilityText: Exhaust this card and that owner of the planet gains two trade goods

name: Zenith
title: Warden
abilityText: Once per ground combat, when one of your Sentinels is destroyed, you may place it on any other planet you control.

name: Korrin
title: Elder
abilityText: During this game round, you can ignore your Limited Presence restriction. At the end of the round, purge this card.
